ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: 1. I learned a lot of English learning tools and methods and resources. For words, now I know where I can look up new words using Dictionary.com and other good dictionaries. To have a good pronunciation, I can use the website howjsay.com. To improve my pronunciation and accent, I can use the nativeaccent3.carnegiespeech.com. Since I have known them, the only thing I can do is keeping practicing and making progress everyday. I am sure I will become a good English speaker soon. 2. This semester I had three presentation and two news report, which benefits me a lot. From the presentations I had, I know what aspects I should pay attention to and how to give a good presentation from the preparation to the rehearsal then to the presentation. Also, I know how to improve the presentation by recording it and self-evaluate and ask others to give feedback. For the news report, I learned how to read news and present it others. I will also keep doing that.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The class is organized to improve every aspects of presentations in English; not only pronunciation and vocabulary, but also how to construct introduction and conclusion, how to construct audience rapport, etc.

The strengths: I learned a lot of English learning tools and methods and resources. For words, now I know where I can look up new words using Dictionary.com and other good dictionaries. To have a good pronunciation, I can use the website howjsay.com. To improve my pronunciation and accent, I can use the nativeaccent3.carnegiespeech.com. Since I have known them, the only thing I can do is keeping practicing and making progress everyday. I am sure I will become a good English speaker soon. The weaknesses: the course is not systematic and may the organization can be improved.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Those who are not confident in presentations in English should take this course. It will make them understand what their strength and weakness are with respect to presentations.
Yes, for students who want to improve their English, it is a good course to learn speaking, listening, reading and writing.
